question: What does CSS stand for?
Which CSS property is used to control the text size?
How can you make a list that lists its items with squares in CSS?
What is the purpose of the z-index property in CSS?
options: It controls the transparency of an element
It controls the stacking order of positioned elements
It sets the spacing between lines of text
It adjusts the brightness of an element
correctAnswer: It controls the stacking order of positioned elements

question: Which CSS property is used for adding shadows to text?
How do you center an element horizontally in CSS?
Which CSS property is used to control the spacing between individual letters in text?
What is the purpose of the CSS property 'box-sizing: border-box;'?
options: It adds a border to the box
It includes the padding and border in the box's total width and height
It sets the box to a circular shape
It adds a shadow to the box
correctAnswer: It includes the padding and border in the box's total width and height

question: Which CSS property is used to change the color of the text in an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS property 'position: relative;'?
options: It sets the element's position relative to its parent
It removes the element from the normal document flow
It aligns the element to the center
correctAnswer: It sets the element's position relative to its parent

question: What is the CSS 'float' property used for?
options: To create a floating effect for elements
To change the color of text
To add space around an element
correctAnswer: To create a floating effect for elements

question: Which CSS property is used to add space between the borders of an element and its content?
What does the CSS property 'display: none;' do?
options: It removes the element from the document flow
It hides the element's text content
correctAnswer: It removes the element from the document flow

question: Which CSS property is used to set the background color of an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'overflow' property?
options: To add a shadow to the element
To set the visibility of an element
To control the scrolling behavior of overflowing content
correctAnswer: To control the scrolling behavior of overflowing content

question: Which CSS property is used to change the style of the cursor when hovering over an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'position: absolute;' property?
options: To set the element's position relative to its parent
To remove the element from the normal document flow
To align the element to the center
correctAnswer: To remove the element from the normal document flow

question: Which CSS property is used to add a border to an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'text-decoration' property?
options: To change the font style of text
To add a background color to text
To underline, strike through, or overline text
To change the color of text
correctAnswer: To underline, strike through, or overline text

question: Which CSS property is used to control the spacing between words in text?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'line-height' property?
options: To set the height of an element
To change the spacing between lines of text
correctAnswer: To change the spacing between lines of text

question: Which CSS property is used to change the appearance of an element's border?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'opacity' property?
options: To set the element's position relative to its parent
To control the transparency of an element
To align the element to the center
correctAnswer: To control the transparency of an element

question: Which CSS property is used to change the appearance of an element's corners?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'visibility' property?
options: To set the element's position relative to its parent
To control the visibility of an element
To align the element to the center
correctAnswer: To control the visibility of an element

question: Which CSS property is used to set the style of an element's border image?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'outline' property?
options: To set the element's position relative to its parent
To add an outline around an element
To align the element to the center
correctAnswer: To add an outline around an element

question: Which CSS property is used to control the alignment of text within an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'overflow-x' and 'overflow-y' properties?
options: To control the scrolling behavior of overflowing content horizontally and vertically
To set the element's position relative to its parent
To align the element to the center
correctAnswer: To control the scrolling behavior of overflowing content horizontally and vertically
